DebugModeSettings.Description: Show debug messages in chat, 1 = true, 0 = false

PointsOverflowSettings.Description: Allow points to overflow to the next day, 1 = true, 0 = false

RewardTriggerSettings.Description: When points should be rewarded, 0 = Reward each day, 1 = Reward on kill (might cause lag)

BannerMaxDistanceSettings.Description: How close a zombie needs to be to a colony to register

ZombieInfo.Description: Holds the points information for each zombie type
